## Integrales por sustitución

:::{#firstcol}
1. $$\int \frac{x}{(x^2 + 2)^2}\, dx$$

1. $$\int \cos(\cos(x))\operatorname{sen}(x)\, dx$$

1. $$\int \operatorname{tg}(x)\, dx $$
:::

:::{#secondcol}
5. $$\int \sin(x)^3 \cos(x)\, dx$$

1. $$\int e^{e^x}\, e^x\, dx$$

## Integrales racionales

:::{#firstcol}
27. $$\int \frac{x^3}{x^2 - 2x + 1} \, dx$$
1. $$\int \frac{x+1}{x^3+2x^2+x}\, dx$$ 
1. $$\int \frac{x^2 + 3x + 5}{x^3 - 7x + 6} \, dx$$
:::

:::{#secondcol}
30.  $$\int \frac{x}{x^2 + 2x + 5} \, dx$$
21.  $$\int \frac{x^3 + 2}{x(x - 1)(x + 2)} \, dx$$
